agentCard.name: Medical Verification Agent Factory Agent
agentCard.description: Medical AI Verification Agent Factory - generates specialized medical validation agents using all 5 core agent factories (core, RAG, citation, web_search, consistency) for FDA-compliant medical AI verification with clinical evidence assessment, drug interaction validation, and regulatory compliance checking
